title: Create a Virtual Data Room for M&A
description: In an M&A deal, the seller's counsel needs to set up a virtual data room (VDR) for the buyer to conduct due diligence.

tasks.description: Create a new VDR and set up a folder structure based on a standard due diligence checklist (e.g., 'Corporate Records', 'Material Contracts', 'IP').
Upload all the relevant company documents into the appropriate folders.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent populates the VDR with the diligence materials.

tasks.description: Set up user accounts for the buyer's legal team and grant them 'view only' access to the documents.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent manages user permissions to securely share the documents.
